mapper.select: select IFNULL(cert_status,0) AS certStatus from s_cert_record where user_id=#{userId} and cert_type=#{certType} ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1

select IFNULL((select cert_status from s_cert_record where user_id=#{userId} and cert_type=0 ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1),0) as identityCert, IFNULL((select cert_status from s_cert_record where user_id=#{userId} and cert_type=1 ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1),0) as livingyCert, IFNULL((select cert_status from s_cert_record where user_id=#{userId} and cert_type=2 ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1),0) as idUserCert from s_user where id=#{userId}
